il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.general

Class SempreExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.general.SempreExperiment

  • public class SempreExperiment
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an entire Sempre experiment (i.e. Sempre learning process)(e.g. 4 iterations of train & dev). Note that when running a 2-step training experiment, each step is represented by its own SempreExperiment object.

    • Field Detail

      • moduleResourceDir

        public final java.nio.file.Path moduleResourceDir

      • sempreParser

        @Nullable
public edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Parser sempreParser
        This is null if the Parser was not yet created.

      • trainTestSplit

        public final il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.ExampleSplit trainTestSplit
        In case edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Dataset#opts#maxExamples is not empty, this split may contain examples that won't be used.

      • analysis

        public final SempreExperimentAnalysis analysis

      • isFirstStep

        public final boolean isFirstStep
        true if this object represents a first-step in a 2-step execution.

      • featuresToOptimizeWeightsFor

        @Nullable
public final ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.set.SafeSet<java.lang.String> featuresToOptimizeWeightsFor
        When not null, only the weights of these features are considered by the optimization algorithm as variables to optimize (all other weights are considered as constants by the optimization algorithm). A null value represents all possible features.

      • featuresAllowedToBeExtracted

        @Nullable
public ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.set.SafeSet<java.lang.String> featuresAllowedToBeExtracted
        When not null, only these features are allowed to be extracted (i.e. these are the features that are used by the model). A null value means not adding restrictions.

      • conditionalWeightUpdater

        @Nullable
public final ConditionalWeightUpdater conditionalWeightUpdater
        null iff not used.

      • featureNameStorageOfCurrentInference

        public FeatureNameStorage featureNameStorageOfCurrentInference
        The reason that this is not a field in InferenceData is that it needs to be used by the constructor of InferenceData. It is cleared by endInference().

      • exampleIdToExample

        public final ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.map.SafeMap<java.lang.String,il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.Example> exampleIdToExample
        Contains both the train and test examples.

      • settings

        public final ExperimentSettings settings

        Parameters:
        outputAnalysisDir - may already exist.
        featuresToOptimizeWeightsFor - if null, all weights are being optimized.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentDatasetGroupLabel

        public DatasetSempreGroupLabel getCurrentDatasetGroupLabel()

      • getCurrentIterationNumber

        public java.lang.Integer getCurrentIterationNumber()
        Returns:
        The current iteration number. Starts at 1 (unlike in Sempre where the iteration # starts at 0). Returns null in case the first iterations didn't start yet.

      • getCurrentExampleBeingParsed

        @NotNull
public il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.Example getCurrentExampleBeingParsed()

        @NotNull
public InferenceData getCurrentInferenceData()

      • setCurrentIterationNumber

        public void setCurrentIterationNumber(int currentIterationNumber)
        Parameters:
        currentIterationNumber - 1-based (unlike in Sempre where the iteration # starts at 0).

      • startNewInference

        public void startNewInference(edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Example sempreExample)
        Should be called by external logic when starting a new inference. Reminder: sempre may invoke two consecutive inferences on the same example.

      • endInference

        public void endInference()

      • newDatasetGroupBegins

        public void newDatasetGroupBegins(java.lang.String groupLabel)

      • calcWeightUpdate

        public double calcWeightUpdate(java.lang.String featureName,
                               double originalUpdate)
        To be called when Sempre tries to do an update.
        Parameters:
        originalUpdate - the update that Sempre originally intended to add to the weight.
        Returns:
        the (possibly modified) update to be carried out.

      • postprocessGradient

        public void postprocessGradient(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> gradient)
        Should be called immediately after Sempre calculates the gradient of the objective.
        Parameters:
        gradient - a map from feature name to the element of its weight in the gradient vector. May be modified by this method.

      • setSempreParser

        public void setSempreParser(edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Parser sempreParser)
